    Book
     

    Poisson Line Cox Process: Foundations and Applications to Vehicular Networks
    Harpreet S. Dhillon and Vishnu Vardhan Chetlur
    Morgan & Claypool Publishers
    June 2020

    Part of the Synthesis Lectures on Learning, Networks, and Algorithms
    Also available here: IEEE Xplore | Amazon | Google Books

    Book Chapter

    • M. Banagar, V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon: “Stochastic Geometry-based Performance Analysis of Drone Cellular Networks”, in UAV Communications for 5G and Beyond. Y. Zeng, I. Guvenc, R. Zhang, G. Geraci, and D. W. Matolak, eds. Wiley, pp. 233-254, Dec. 2020. (Chapter DOI)

    Journal Articles

    1. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Spatial Models for Networks on Roads: Bridging the Gap between Industry and Academia”, IEEE Network, vol. 36, no. 1, pp. 26-31, Feb. 2022. (IEEE Xplore)

    2. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “On the Load Distribution of Vehicular Users Modeled by a Poisson Line Cox Process”, IEEE Wireless Communications Letters, vol. 9, no. 12, pp. 2121-2125, Dec. 2020. (IEEE Xplore) (arXiv)

    3. V. V. Chetlur, H. S. Dhillon, C. P. Dettmann, “Shortest Path Distance in Manhattan Poisson Line Cox Process”, Journal of Statistical Physics, vol. 181, no. 6, pp. 2109-2130, Dec. 2020. (JSP Article Page) (Free Access from Springer Nature SharedIt) (arXiv) (Code)

    4. M. Banagar, V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Handover Probability in Drone Cellular Networks”, IEEE Wireless Communications Letters, vol. 9, no. 7, pp. 933-937, Jul. 2020. (IEEE Xplore) (arXiv) (Code)

    5. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Coverage and Rate Analysis of Downlink Cellular Vehicle-to-Everything (C-V2X) Communication”, IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, vol. 19, no. 3, pp. 1738-1753, Mar. 2020. (IEEE Xplore) (arXiv) (Code)

    6. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Success Probability and Area Spectral Efficiency of a VANET Modeled as a Cox Process”, IEEE Wireless Communications Letters, vol. 7, no. 5, pp. 856-859, Oct. 2018. (IEEE Xplore) (arXiv)

    7. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Coverage Analysis of a Vehicular Network Modeled as Cox Process Driven by Poisson Line Process”, IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, vol. 17, no. 7, pp. 4401-4416, Jul. 2018. (IEEE Xplore) (arXiv) (Video)

    8. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Downlink Coverage Analysis for a Finite 3-D Wireless Network of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles”, IEEE Transactions on Communications, vol. 65, no. 10, pp. 4543-4558, Oct. 2017. (IEEE Xplore) (arXiv)

    Conference Papers

    1. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Poisson Line Cox Process: Asymptotic Characterization and Performance Analysis of Vehicular Networks”, in Proc. IEEE Globecom, Waikoloa, HI, Dec. 2019. (IEEE Xplore)

    2. V. V. Chetlur, S. Guha and H. S. Dhillon, “Characterization of V2V Coverage in a Network of Roads Modeled as Poisson Line Process”, in Proc. IEEE ICC, Kansas City, MO, May 2018. (IEEE Xplore)

    3. V. V. Chetlur and H. S. Dhillon, “Downlink Coverage Probability in a Finite Network of Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) Base Stations”, in Proc. IEEE SPAWC, Edinburgh, UK, July 2016. (IEEE Xplore)

    4. V. V. Makkapati and V. V. Chetlur, “Computation of Tortuosity of Two Dimensional Vessels”, in Proc. IEEE ICAPR, Kolkata, India, January 2015. (IEEE Xplore)

    Dissertation

    V. V. Chetlur, “Stochastic Geometry for Vehicular Networks”, Ph. D. dissertation, Virginia Tech, 2020. (pdf)
